snippet: After accepting an invitation to appear on a television channel owned by the Russian government, the columnist James Kirchick surprised producers on Wednesday by decrying Russia’s anti-gay legislation.
abstract: After accepting an invitation to appear on a television channel owned by the Russian government, the columnist James Kirchick surprised producers on Wednesday by decrying Russia’s anti-gay legislation.

headline.main: American Uses Kremlin-Financed Network to Denounce Russia's Anti-Gay Legislation
